amendment.description: To authorize a pilot program on the expanded use of mentor-protege authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4199 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4199 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5937) To authorize a pilot program on the expanded use of mentor-protege authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4199 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4199 proposed by Senator Warner.
